Body: Currently my Nexus 5 is on Android M preview. I know that developer preview won't get the OTA update, that's why I am trying to manually install OTA of Android M public release, but I get these errors on 50%:failed to verify whole-file signature signature verification failed Installation abortedadding more details:no rootno custom recoveryjust bootloader unlockedno changes in system filesDoes manually installing Android M final release OTA work on device running on Android M preview? Or do I need to downgrade it to Lollipop first?
Title: Installing Android M OTA on Android M preview

history.Text: currently my nexus 5 is on android M preview, I am trying to manually install OTA of android M public release. getting these errors on 50%:    failed to verify whole-file signature     signature verification failed Installation aborted
